about.title: About
about.text:
Multicycles is the technology demo of fluctuo's Data Flow API.

Fluctuo is the startup specialized in shared mobility. More info on fluctuo.com.

Find out more about the Data Flow API on flow.fluctuo.com. This API integrates real-time data from over 200 shared mobility operators around the world.

fluctuo also developed, City Dive, a historical data dashboard. More info on dive.fluctuo.com.

linkedin | twitter

account.title: My Account
account.intro: Combine all your accounts in a single account. Link your accounts to take full advantage of Multicycles. You'll never have to switch from one app to another to find the right vehicle for you again.

LinkSubaccountModal.title: Login and link my {provider} account
LinkSubaccountModal.limeStep1: To link your Lime account, set your phone number. You ll receive a message with a password. Please use internationnal format.
LinkSubaccountModal.limeStep2: Put the received code number on you phone.
LinkSubaccountModal.birdStep1: To link your Bird account, set your email. You ll receive a message with a token at the bottom.
LinkSubaccountModal.birdStep2: Put the token received by email
LinkSubaccountModal.fleedbirdStep: To link your account, set your email and password.
LinkSubaccountModal.phoneStep1: To link your account, set your phone number. You ll receive a message with a password. Please use internationnal format.
LinkSubaccountModal.phoneStep2: Put the token received by email
LinkSubaccountModal.passwordStep: Put your password to refresh auth

MissingModal.description: With hundreds of cities, it's not always easy to be up to date. Thanks to submit a missing provider for this location. We will check it and add the missing provider.
